front.title: Use of BGP for dissemination of ILA mapping information

abstract.t: Identifier-Locator Addressing [I-D.herbert-nvo3-ila] relies on splitting the 128-bit IPv6 address into identifier and locator parts to implement identifier mobility, and network virtualization. This document proposes a method for distributing the identifier to locator mapping information using Multiprotocol Extensions for BGP-4 [RFC4760].
